title: First MOCK DRAFT of 2022 + Best Ball Breakdown - Fantasy Football Podcast for 5/26
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a special episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason each battle it out during the first mock draft show of the year! Get strategies from three different spots in fantasy football drafts! Plus, the debut of “Best Ball Breakdown” presented by Underdog Fantasy. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for May 26th, 2022.

Get the lowest price on the 2022 UDK before June 1st! UltimateDraftKit.com

Full Mock Draft Results

(04:25) - NFL News
(09:30) - Mock Draft
(52:45) - Best Ball Breakdown
